trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Raytown
There were 2 other sightings in Raytown on or around July 5th 2010
divs: sighting detailsat 10:25 last night (7\5\10) my wife and i were coming home in our car. as we came down our street towards our house in eastern kansas city on eastern border of raytown, my wife said "what's that" as our house came into full view. she stopped the car in middle of street and was pointing at our house. i was not focused as she was on the sky behind our house and was concerned that she was pointing out something wrong at our house. i asked her what was she talking about and she said "do you see that" and started backing the car up the street which is slight incline away from our home. as we got to the high point of the street - about 4 houses up from our house, i could see what caught her eye. above our house and the surrounding tree line were 3 clearly visible objects that were oval shaped and orange\reddish color. i could not determine how far away they were or the size but the objects were clearly visible with 2 shapes close together higher and to the left of the third object as we were facing east\northeast. the shapes looked about like a traffic light from about a half block away except oval in shape and orange\red in color. we watched these objects which were stationary for couple of minutes. while watching these 3 oval shapes - a large firework went off in the air to the left of the objects (evening of july 5th and some people still setting off fireworks). the sparks from the firework (which seemed to be several blocks from our house) spread in front but to the left of the 2 higher objects which gave imnpression they were much further away. my wife said when she first saw the shapes - she thought there were 4 but as we sat and watched - i only saw 3. we drove on to our house and parked car in the garage. i went inside and got a pair of binoculars and went to our deck on south\east side of our house. i could not see any objects from our deck above the tree line. my wife and walked up the street to the spot where we saw the objects from the car, but there was nothing unusual in the sky anywhere to be seen. when we were looking i could see stars clearly, so the sky was clear or only partly cloudy at this time. we did not see the objects move while we were watching them - they were stationary in the sky, but they wee completely gone when we went outside to look for them after parking the car.
Summary: 3 oval shaped orange/red objects stationary in the air east of our house.
